meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jonah Platt Maryann Penzvalto Alan Harrison Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7706.

td.p: Jonah Platt, a writer from Los Angeles, California
Maryann Penzvalto, a librarian from Cleveland, Ohio
Alan Harrison, an administrative assistant from Seattle, Washington (whose 2-day cash winnings total $23,710)

tr.td: DEEP STATE
BEJEWELED
THE BOOK'S ORIGINAL LANGUAGE
SEARCH TERMS
ROCK, PAPER & SCISSORS
THE TV CHARACTER IS HAVING A MOMENT
